name: Tree Runner (Team Tree Runner)
description:
Tree Runner

Tree Runner is an infinite runner arcade mobile game, where you climb a tree  as high as possible and collect fruit along the way. The fruit you have collected can be used to unlock all kinds of crazy abilities that change the way you play!

The game is currently still in beta, with the release planned for later this year. This final version will include additional Abilities to choose from, and some bug fixes.

We also have a small questionnaire regarding your game experience. It would help us greatly if you would fill this out afterwards here.
(it will only take about 5 minutes!)

Thank you for checking out Tree Runner! Feel free to share your thoughts in the comments!

Art & Animation: Bobby Wessels
Music & Programming: Ike Rijsdijk
